message.subject: TW Negotiated rate with USGT
message.content:
M1.1. For your info, we have received a protest and or reguest for Tech Conference or hearing from the CPUC regarding the USGT transaction starting Nov 1, 2001.
[Inform: Mary has received a protest and/or request for a Tech Conference or hearing regarding a USGT transaction]
Sflink1.1
M1.2. they raise the market power issue, the pricing, the volume, the policy of market based rates.
[Inform: the issues raised are market power, pricing, volume, and rate policy]
M1.3. We expect a similar protest from IS, and also the issue regarding the alternate point use.
[Inform: Mary expects IS to issue a similar protest]
Sflink1.3
M1.4. The volume on this transaction is for 400,000 per day with the negotiated rate provision only relating to the alternate path to Calif.
[Inform: daily volume on transaction, and detail regarding negotiated rate provision]
M1.5. More to come.
[Inform: there will be more information yet to come]

message.subject: TW Negotiated rate with USGT
message.content:
M2.1. fyi
[Inform: the presumably attached previous email is being sent for Bill's information]

message.subject: TW Negotiated rate with USGT
message.content:
M3.1. Mary Kay,
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. What is the usual process on something like this?
[Request-Information: usual process on such a matter]
Blink1.1
Flink3.2
M3.3. Do we get a chance to respond to the protest before the FERC makes a decision on whether to hold a Tech Conf?
[Request-Information: can Kim et al. have a chance to respond to the protest before a Tech Conference might be scheduled]
Blink1.1
Flink3.3
M3.4. What is the timeline for any other protests to come in?
[Request-Information: timeline for other protests]
Blink1.3
Flink3.4
M3.5. What is the timeline for FERC to decide?
[Request-Information: timeline for FERC to decide whether to hold a Tech Conference]
Flink3.5
M3.6. Thanks, Kim.
[Conventional: thanks, signature]

message.subject: TW Negotiated rate with USGT
message.content:
M4.1. Yes, we will prepare a answer to the protests and I believe that Maria is working with Bill Rapp on this-
[Inform: Mary Kay et al. will prepare a response to protests, and Maria and Bill Rapp are working on it]
Blink3.3
M4.2. still haven't seen whether IS filed, but I can't believe they didn't.
[Inform: Mary Kay does not know whether IS filed a protest, though it is likely]
Blink3.4
M4.3. The FERC should issue an order by the end of Nov so we need to get the answer in quick-
[Inform: FERC will issue an order by the end of November]
Blink3.5
M4.4. MK
[Conventional: signature]
